snippet.title: 10 Best Ways to Enjoy Thanksgiving Leftovers
snippet.description: Talk about leftovers: some 45 million turkeys totaling over one billion pounds will end up on dinner plates around the country on Thanksgiving Day. Here are easy, tasty ways to use the remains.
